Shield your RV or caravan from the elements with our durable 600D Oxford Waterproof Roof Hatch Cover. This sunshade provides reliable protection against rain, snow, and harmful UV rays, keeping your interior cool and comfortable even on the hottest days.

Crafted from high-quality 600D Oxford fabric, this roof hatch cover is built to withstand the rigors of travel. Its waterproof design ensures that moisture stays out, protecting your belongings and preventing damage to your RV's interior.

This 600D Oxford waterproof roof hatch cover is designed to protect your RV skylights and caravan vents from the elements while you're on the road. Made with durable materials and featuring a secure closure, this sunshade provides reliable protection against rain, snow, wind, and harmful UV rays.

  • 600D Oxford Fabric Construction: Built to withstand harsh weather conditions and provide long-lasting durability.
  • Waterproof Design: Keeps your roof hatch dry and protected from moisture damage.
  • UV Sun Protection: Shields your RV interior from harmful UV rays, preventing fading and damage to furnishings.
  • Secure Closure System: Ensures a tight fit and prevents the cover from blowing away in strong winds.

This roof hatch cover is specifically designed to fit standard-sized RV skylights and caravan vents. The exact dimensions may vary depending on the manufacturer, so please refer to the product listing or consult with your RV dealer for specific compatibility information.

Protecting your RV roof hatches and vents is crucial for maintaining their functionality and preventing water damage. This sunshade provides several key benefits:

  • Prevents Water Damage: Keep your skylights and vents free from leaks and moisture buildup, protecting your RV's interior.
  • Extends the Life of Your Roof Hatch: By shielding it from UV rays and harsh weather, this cover helps preserve its condition and longevity.
  • Adds an Extra Layer of Security: The secure closure system prevents unauthorized access to your roof hatches.

Installing and removing this roof hatch cover is a simple process. Simply position it over your skylight or vent and secure it using the provided closure mechanism. Remember to check the fit before securing it to ensure a snug and effective seal.

This sunshade is ideal for use while traveling, storing your RV, or simply when you need to protect your roof hatches from the elements.
